# teamData

**Instance Property**

The collection of data an app uses to hold private team information during drag and drop.

## Declaration

```swift
var teamData: Data? { get set }
```

## Configuring the provider

- **preferredPresentationSize**: The ideal presentation size of the item.
- **preferredPresentationStyle**: The preferred style for presenting the item provider’s data.
- **NSItemProvider.PreferredPresentationStyle**: The presentation styles that determine how a view shows an item provider’s data.
- **suggestedName**: The filename to use when writing the provided data to a file on disk.
